title: My Daily Routine
text: Hi! My name is Tom. I am a student. I wake up at 7 o'clock every day. I have breakfast at 7:30. I eat bread and drink milk. I go to school at 8 o'clock. I study from 9 to 3. After school, I play football with my friends. I come home at 5 o'clock. I do my homework. I have dinner with my family at 7. I watch TV and go to bed at 10. I like my daily routine!
